description: In base ten, we try to get the digits 0,1,2,3,...,9,0,1,2,3,... in order only using a sequence of increasing primes and each time choosing the smallest prime that will give the desired digit.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 04 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 09 2001
